name: Sheep Don't Swim
description:
Though this is mostly designed to be a mobile game, currently it primarily supports a mouse and behaves a little weird with touch. I plan to change this in the next version.

How to play:

Herd the sheep onto the wooden platforms using your mouse or touchscreen. If all your sheep drown, it's game over!

The longer your sheep survive, the easier it is to find coins! You can use your coins to buy more sheep to start the game with.
